Clever Maneuver.name: Clever Maneuver
Clever Maneuver.flavor: You attack your foe with a quick slash, then shove it toward one of your allies to finish off.
Clever Maneuver.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 3 squares. If the target ends the slide adjacent to any of your allies, one of your allies adjacent to it can make a melee basic attack against it as a free action.

Kneel to the Prince.name: Kneel to the Prince
Kneel to the Prince.flavor: You trip your foe, lashing out at it as it stumbles past you.
Kneel to the Prince.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 3 squares and knock it prone. The target canâ€™t stand up (save ends).
Kneel to the Prince.onMiss: Half damage, and you knock the target prone.

Run for It.name: Run for It
Run for It.flavor: On your signal, your band scatters out of sight.
Run for It.target: You and one ally in the burst
Run for It.effect: Each target can move his or her speed and make a Stealth check to become hidden as a free action.
